text: Nieuwvliet is a village in the Dutch province of Zeeland. It is located about 5 km north of Oostburg, in the municipality of Sluis Nieuwvliet was a separate municipality until 1970, when it was merged with Oostburg. ==References== ==External links== * Map of the former municipality in 1868. Category:Populated places in Zeeland Category:Former municipalities of Zeeland Category:Sluis
title: Nieuwvliet
